channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Acrobat and Reader
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Acrobat and Reader

item.title: CVE-2018-12778|2024-08-05T08:45:01.730Z -- adobe -- acrobat%20and%20reader
item.description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader versions 2018.011.20058 and earlier, 2017.011.30099 and earlier, and 2015.006.30448 and earlier have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2018-12849|2024-08-05T08:45:02.359Z -- adobe -- acrobat%20and%20reader
item.description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader versions 2018.011.20058 and earlier, 2017.011.30099 and earlier, and 2015.006.30448 and earlier have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2018-12848|2024-08-05T08:45:02.346Z -- adobe -- acrobat%20and%20reader
item.description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader versions 2018.011.20058 and earlier, 2017.011.30099 and earlier, and 2015.006.30448 and earlier have an out-of-bounds write vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader versions 2018.011.20058 and earlier, 2017.011.30099 and earlier, and 2015.006.30448 and earlier have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.
